properties.name: Lorna Blacksmith
properties.description: Lorna was found on Simcoe Street. This was revealed to the police after her murderer was arrested for an unrelated sexual assault on another woman.

properties.name: Carolyn Sinclair
properties.description: Carolyn Sinclair was a sister, a soon-to-be-mother, a daughter, a cousin, a niece, and a friend. She was five months pregnant and battling addiction when she went missing in December 2011. Her body was found in a dumpster in a Notre Dame Avenue back lane after the man who would be charged with her murder reported the location to the police.

properties.name: Tanya Nepinak
properties.description: Tanya Nepinak was a mother of two, a wife, a daughter, a sister, a cousin, a niece, and a friend. She was last seen on September 13, 2011. Her body has never been recovered, although it is suspected that it may be at the Brady Road Landfill. A large-scale search in 2012 was unsuccessful.
